solver.search.limits

Interface ICounter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISearchMonitor, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ACounter, BacktrackCounter, FailCounter, NodeCounter, SolutionCounter, ThreadTimeCounter, TimeCounter

    public interface ICounter
extends Serializable, ISearchMonitor
    An interface to define count smth during search process
    Since:
    15 juil. 2010
    Author:
    Charles Prud'homme
    See Also:
    ThreadTimeCounter, NodeCounter, BacktrackCounter, FailCounter, SolutionCounter
